comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I think the man in the top hat is Rhinelander Waldo, then NYC's Police Commissioner: www.absoluteastronomy.com/topics/Rhinelander_Waldo And that's "Paymaster" Charles Conard -- many Google hits for him, but I didn't find anything biographical.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In the movie, "Ragtime," Rhinelander Waldo was played by Jimmy Cagney.
